sale_price_font_size_phone=”20px” sale_price_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_module=”6203″ saved_tabs=”all”][/et_pb_wc_price][et_pb_text content_phone=”

Your Intelligent Companion robot is here, ready to befriend, entertain, teach, and communicate in a wide variety of scenarios. Alpha Mini is highly portable, bringing fun interactions and a wealth of expressions and functionality, including voice interaction, 4G LTE connectivity, face recognition, illustrated book recognition, and object recognition.

” content_last_edited=”off|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_text_color=”#6B6B6B” header_font_size=”20px” header_letter_spacing=”1px” header_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px|30px|-9px|30px|false|true” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_padding=”||||true|true” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet”]

Bring the magic of robotics home with the Mythical Series: UnicornBot Kit. This buildable, codable UnicornBot kit comes with everything needed to build and program your own magnificent unicorn. Activate the color sensor and smooth motion servos to make UnicornBot drive, dance, play and more.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_toggle title=”Show More” open_toggle_background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” content_phone=”

Fourteen servo motors power a variety of flexible movements, such as dancing, kung fu, and getting up after a fall, while the adorable LCD eyes can show emotion and expressions – making Alpha Mini feel like a true part of the family.

” content_last_edited=”off|phone” module_class=”et-readmore-toggle” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” body_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”-30px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”10px|30px|0px|30px|false|true” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|phone” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” body_font_size_tablet=”” body_font_size_phone=”16px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_main_element=”display:flex;||flex-direction: column;||align-items: flex-end;” custom_css_toggle_title=”order:2;||padding-right:25px !important;” custom_css_toggle_content=”order:1;||padding: 0px;” border_width_all=”0px”]

Kids can even program the brilliant LED horn with a wide selection of custom colors!

UnicornBot is the perfect introduction to coding and programming for kids who love mythical creatures.

Always inspiring creativity, the JIMU Robot system motivates kids to explore robotics and STEM learning. Smart Robots. Smarter Kids.

Details:

  • Buildable, codable, mythical creature for magical fun
  • 440 interlocking, interchangeable parts to build UnicornBot or another imaginative creation
  • Program movement with the color sensor and included 8 color cards for customized actions and dances
  • Brilliant LED unicorn horn that allows users to choose colors on the RGB color spectrum
  • Program the robot to walk, dance, move and more using Blockly coding in the JIMU app
  • Create custom actions with the PRP (Pose, Record, Play) function
  • No tools required – our 3D, 360° animated building instructions make it easy.
  • Awards include Tillywig 2018 Brain Child Award, CES 2017 Innovation Awards Honoree, Time to Play Magazine 2016 Holiday Most Wanted List, and IFA Awards 2015 Best of Show.
  • Recommended for ages 8+

In The Box:

  • 440 snap-together parts + connectors and fasteners
  • 1 RGB light-up unicorn horn
  • 1 color sensor
  • 2 smooth-motion robotic servo motors
  • 1 DC motor
  • 1 main control box
  • 8 color cards
  • 1 USB cable and quick-start guide
  • A compatible iOS or Android device is required but not included READ LESS
